translation.text: RI-The Joliet East End Elevator is Out of Service
The Rock Island Eastern Avenue elevator will be out of service for several days. Customers can use the Station elevator to access the boarding platform.
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
MDW train #2235 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:10 pm, will not operate due to mechanical problems. Train #2237 will be the next train to accommodate passengers to Big Timber Rd.
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
NCS train # 107, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 5:05 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to waiting on other trains. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
As a Reminder, On Monday, January 19, (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) Metra will operate a regular weekday schedule.
As a reminder, on Monday, January 19, (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) Metra will operate a regular weekday schedule.
BNSF inbound trains delayed/outbound trains delayed
BNSF inbound trains may be operating up to 40 minutes behind schedule and outbound trains are back on the move and may be operating with an extensive due to switch problems.

BNSF train #1312, scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 5:05 PM, will express from Fairview Avenue/Downers Grove to Chicago Union Station due to  switch problems. Train #1276 will accommodate customers at intermediate stops.
The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator is back in service.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.

MDW train #2402, scheduled to depart Franklin Park at 4:55 PM, will be delayed in departure due to emergency track repairs. The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.

BNSF train #1239, scheduled to arrive Aurora at 4:35 PM, will express from Fairview Avenue/Downers Grove to Aurora due to  switch problems. Train #1251 will accommodate customers at intermediate stops.
